title: support Web Crypto API inside a Web Worker
body: The Web Crypto API is not available inside a Web Worker. Both "self.crypto" and "self.msCrypto" are undefined inside a worker context.

comments.body: All major browser (Chrome, Safari, Firefox) added this feature by 2017. Edge + IE are the only browsers which need an ugly workaround :/
